attributes.action: increase members of the British Army salary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The service men and women of the British Army risk their lives day in day out across the world for our freedom. Footballer's kick a football for 90 minutes and get paid millions whereas Our Boys are involved in firefights on the frontline and get very little compared to footballers. The soldiers pay must be raised.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
